settings_reset_db_desc: Clears all internal project records. Safe operation: Does NOT delete any files on your disk.
modal_reset_db_title: âš ï¸ DANGER: Reset Project Database
modal_reset_db_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to wipe the internal database?
modal_reset_db_impact_1: Remove all projects from the 'Open Recent' list.
modal_reset_db_impact_2: Clear all file status (Todo/Done/Proofreading) in the dashboard.
modal_reset_db_safe_3: Modify any file on your disk.
msg_reset_success: Database reset successfully. The application will now reload.
footer_text: Paradox Mod Localization Factory Â©2025 Created by Linglong
homepage_slogans: Victoria 3: The humming of the economy, the tears of the era
Stellaris: Look up at the stars, feet on the... wait, we don't have feet
Hearts of Iron 4: Today's spaghetti determines tomorrow's Rome
glossary_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
glossary_variants_tooltip: Separate multiple variants with a comma
glossary_select_file_prompt: Please select a glossary file from the left
glossary_filename_invalid: Must be a valid name ending in .json (e.g., my_glossary.json)
placeholder_event_renderer_description: This is a placeholder for the Event Renderer tool.
placeholder_ui_debugger_description: This is a placeholder for the UI Debugger tool.
thumbnail_generator.canvas_placeholder: Click to upload, or drag and drop an image...
initial_translation_upload_text: Click or drag a .zip mod file to this area to upload
initial_translation_upload_hint: Support for a single .zip file containing your mod's localization files.
form_desc_disguise_mode: Disguise the output as another language (e.g., English) to support unsupported languages.
form_desc_custom_name: The name used in prompts to the AI.
deploy_success_message: Mod has been deployed to the Paradox official directory. You can now launch the game to see it.
result_subtitle_success: Your translated mod is ready for download.
result_subtitle_failed: Something went wrong. Please check the logs and try again.
message_error_load_config: Failed to load configuration from server.
message_error_translation_failed: Translation task failed. Please check the logs.
message_error_upload_first: Please upload a mod file first!
message_warn_aborted: Translation has been aborted by the user.
message_error_abort_failed: Failed to abort the translation task.
glossary_variants_tooltip_json: Enter variants as a JSON object, e.g., {"en": ["variant1", "variant2"], "zh-CN": ["å˜ä½“1"]}
glossary_abbreviations_tooltip_json: Enter abbreviations as a JSON object, e.g., {"en": "abbr", "zh-CN": "ç¼©å†™"}
glossary_metadata_tooltip_json: Enter metadata as a JSON object, e.g., {"category": "school", "part_of_speech": "Proper Noun"}
glossary_delete_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.
workshop_generator.title: Steam Workshop Description Generator
workshop_generator.description: Automate the process of creating a beautifully formatted Steam Workshop description page for your mod.
workshop_generator.placeholders.manual_i: Enter Steam Workshop URL or ID
workshop_generator.placeholders.template: Enter your localized mod title, description, credits, etc. here.
workshop_generator.loading_tip: Getting original description and calling AI for formatting...
workshop_generator.errors.fetch_config_f: Error: Failed to fetch necessary configuration from the server.
workshop_generator.errors.project_id_mis: Error: The selected project does not have a valid Workshop ID.
workshop_generator.errors.workshop_id_or: Error: A valid Steam Workshop ID and an API Provider are required.
workshop_generator.errors.generation_fai: An unknown error occurred during generation.
workshop_generator.messages.generation_s: BBCode generated, but could not be saved to a file.
project_management.details.title: Title
project_management.manage_paths.title: Manage Translation Directories
form_desc_use_main_glossary: Automatically use the primary dictionary for this game.
form_placeholder_additional_prompt: Add custom instructions for the AI...
warning_clean_source: WARNING: This will delete all files in the translation source folder EXCEPT metadata and localization files. Use with caution.
no_existing_mods: No existing mods found in workspace.
api_settings_description: Configure API keys for various AI providers.
api_settings_storage_info: API keys can be read from environment variables or entered here. Keys entered here are securely stored in your user configuration file (AppData).
proofreading.warning.key_modified_desc: Modifying keys can break localization. Only proceed if you know what you are doing.
proofreading.modal.title: High Risk Action
proofreading.modal.content_1: You have modified one or more **Keys** in the localization file.
proofreading.modal.content_2: Changing keys usually results in **Missing Localization** errors in the game unless you also updated the game code referencing these keys.
proofreading.modal.confirm: Are you absolutely sure you want to save these changes?
proofreading.modal.button_confirm: Yes, I know what I'm doing
proofreading.hint.comments_ignored: Modifications to comments will be ignored upon saving. Patching mode only targets Keys to prevent accidental file corruption.
project_management.actions.create_new_de: Start a new localization journey from a local mod folder.
project_management.confirm_archive: Are you sure you want to archive this project? It will be moved to the Archives.
project_management.confirm_delete_foreve: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this project? This cannot be undone.
project_management.confirm_restore: Are you sure you want to restore this project?
project_management.file_list.table.name: File Name

glossary_editor.variants_desc: Add language-specific variations. For multiple values, separate with a comma.

mining.select_files_desc: Leave empty to scan the entire project.
mining.no_files: Select a project to view files...
mining.mining_disclaimer: Invokes LLM for mining, which may incur API costs.

court.select_case: Select a case from the docket
court.final_translation_desc: Review and edit the suggested translation before approving.

prompt_settings_system_desc: This is the core instruction sent to the AI for batch translation. Modify with caution.
prompt_settings_custom_desc: This prompt will be automatically pre-filled into the "Additional Prompt" field for every new translation task. Useful for consistent style instructions.
prompt_custom_placeholder: Enter your custom instructions here... (e.g. "Always use formal tone", "Do not translate proper nouns")
prompt_reset_confirm_message: This will revert your changes to the default system settings. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
api_model_select_description: Select which model will perform the translations for this provider.
api_models_placeholder: Type and press Enter to add models
api_models_description: Define extra models to be available in the selector above.
model_settings_hint: You can add more models in Settings > API Settings
prompt_settings_warning_desc: Unless you fully understand how the prompt engineering works, we strongly advise against modifying these system prompts. Incorrect changes may lead to translation failures or quality degradation.
prompt_formatting_desc: These rules ensure the AI output is valid JSON. Edit with caution!

welcome.title: Welcome to Remis!
welcome.desc: I'm your smart localization assistant. Let's take a quick tour of the workbench.

stats.title: Core Metrics
stats.desc: View translation progress, word counts, and active tasks at a glance.

activity.title: Recent Activity
activity.desc: Tracks your recent actions including project updates and notes.

quick_links.title: Quick Access
quick_links.desc: One-click access to common tools like Workshop Generator and Glossary Manager.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.desc: Switch between different modules using the sidebar: from Kanban to Proofreading.

search.title: Power Search
search.desc: Global search across files and games to locate any term instantly.

files.title: Glossary Files
files.desc: Manage glossary files for different games on the left.

table.title: Entry Management
table.desc: Edit source text, translations, and variants here. Changes are saved to SQLite instantly.

list.title: Project List
list.desc: View and manage all your localization projects here.

create.title: Create Project
create.desc: Click here to start a new localization project from a folder.

kanban.title: Task Kanban
kanban.desc: Visually manage all localization projects. Drag tasks to update file status.

new_task.title: New Task
new_task.desc: Create file tasks or custom note tasks to track your workflow.

paths.title: Path Management
paths.desc: Configure source and output paths for your mods.

tabs.title: Task Board
tabs.desc: Switch to the Task Board tab to see your Kanban board.

select.title: Select Project
select.desc: Please select a project to begin the translation process.

config.title: Configure Translation
config.desc: Set up your source/target languages and choosing an AI model.

start.title: Start Batch
start.desc: Click this to begin the automated translation batch.

processing.title: Processing
processing.desc: The AI is now translating your files. You can watch the real-time logs here.

mod_select.title: Module Selection
mod_select.desc: Switch between different mods to proofread their contents.

editor.title: Triple-Column Editor
editor.desc: Compare original, AI draft, and final edit side-by-side with real-time sync.

validate.title: Integrity Check
validate.desc: Run automated checks for missing tags, broken variables, or inconsistent terminology.

auto_start_prompt.title: Quick Start
auto_start_prompt.message: It seems it's your first time here. Would you like a quick tour?

version_info.issue_desc: If you encounter any bugs or have feature suggestions, please feel free to leave a message on our GitHub Issues page.
version_info.log_hint: Tip: To help us identify the problem quickly, please make sure to attach the relevant log files from the logs/ directory.
version_info.star_encouragement: If you find this project helpful, giving us a Star ðŸŒŸ on GitHub would be the greatest encouragement!

api_desc_gemini_cli: Via Google Gemini CLI, 1000 free calls/day, supports parallel processing
api_desc_grok: Access Grok-4 fast-reasoning model via official xAI API
api_desc_qwen: Alibaba Cloud Qwen (Tongyi Qianwen) - Beijing Region
api_desc_kimi: Moonshot AI Kimi Model (Includes latest K2 series)
api_desc_ollama: Local Ollama Models, no API Key required
api_desc_lm_studio: Connect to local LM Studio (Default Port 1234)
api_desc_vllm: Connect to local vLLM Service (Default Port 8000)
api_desc_koboldcpp: Connect to local KoboldCPP Service (Default Port 5001)
api_desc_oobabooga: Connect to Oobabooga Text Gen WebUI (OpenAI Extension, Port 5000)
api_desc_custom: (Advanced) Connect to any OpenAI-compatible API service
context_sidebar.translation_info: Select a mod to see details here.
context_sidebar.project_info: Select a project task to view properties.
context_sidebar.glossary_info: Select a term to view definitions and variants.
